title: McDonald Observatory
summary: The McDonald Observatory is an astronomical observatory located near the unincorporated community of Fort Davis in Jeff Davis County, Texas, United States. The facility is located on Mount Locke in the Davis Mountains of West Texas, with additional facilities on Mount Fowlkes, approximately 1.3 kilometers (0.81Â mi) to the northeast.[1]  The observatory is part of the University of Texas at Austin. It is an organized research unit of the College of Natural Sciences.
